name: street brawler
description:
STREET BRAWLER :

Destroy your opponent's lifebar to win.

Each player have 7 buttons : 4 to move his character + 1 punch button + 1 kick button + 1 special button (press enter to pause the game)

You can play the versus mode (2 players) or  the arcade mode (1 player)

Click on the settings button to set your controls (any controller will work but only on Firefox) and to change the difficulty of the cpus.

Basics :

Left and right to move

Down to crouch

Up to jump

Walk backward or crouch while holding back to block. When you block a hit, you don't take any damage but you fill your block bar which, when it's full, makes you unable to block for a while.

There are 3 different skins for each character you can access by pressing either punch, kick or special button.

Command inputs :

For everyone :

  • forward+punch = low punch
  • punch+no direction = medium punch
  • back+punch = high punch
  • forward+kick = low kick
  • kick+no direction = medium kick
  • back+kick = high kick

There are variations of this moves you can do while crouching or while being in the air

Ryu :

  • special+no direction (grounded) = hadouken
  • special+(left or right) (grounded) = tatsumaki
  • (down+special) or (special in the air) = shoryuken

Chun li :

  • special+no direction (grounded) = kikouken
  • hold down+special (grounded) = spinning bird kick
  • special in the air = double jump + change jump direction

Dictator :

  • special + back (grounded) = scissors kick
  • hold forward+special (grounded) = psycho dash
  • special in the air = double jump

Guile :

  • hold back+special (grounded) = sonic boom
  • hold down+special (grounded) = flash kick

Cammy :

  • special+no direction (grounded) = cannon drill
  • down+special (grounded) = thrust kick
  • special in the air = change jump direction
